GARDNER Iain (edited by), with contributions by S. CLACKSON, M. FRANZMANN and K.A. WORP, Kellis Literary Texts. Volume 1. (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 4 = Oxbow Monograph 69.)
Oxford, Oxbow Books, 1996, 4°, xix-188 pp. et 28 pll. ISBN 1-900188-10-4. £35.

Introduction. - Section A: Coptic Texts. - Section B: Syriac Texts. - Section C: Greek Texts: P. Kellis Gr. II, 91-94 [faisant suite à: P. Kellis Gr. I, 1-90]. - Pp. 186-188: Addenda & Corrigenda to P. Kellis Gr. I.
C.R. par Samuel N.C. Lieu, JRH 23 (1999) pp. 243-244.
